author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Anyone surprised by these polling numbers isn’t paying attention, as they’d have to be intentionally naive not to see that the left has become the party of the rich, while Republicans are now the party of the middle class.

This becomes especially clear when you consider that the left effectively replaced a sitting president through the influence of major donors, with zero input from
title: CNN's polling analyst is discombobulated over how Trump is destroying Democrats in key metrics

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
In case it was not clear to Crockett, hating Trump is not a winning campaign strategy. This did not work the first time, and it won’t work for the millionth time. Nonetheless, Crockett has essentially admitted that she has no intention of representing you—her sole focus has been, and seemingly always will be, going after Trump.

Democrat Spokeswoman @RepJasmine says if the Democrat Party wins the Majority she will look into impeaching President Trump.

Democrats don't have a real agenda to help the American people.pic.twitter.com/5pTEBIr9EB
— RNC Research (@RNCResearch) Jun
title: Jasmine Crockett Vows To Introduce Articles Of Impeachment If The Dems Gain Majority

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Many media personalities make false predictions, such as claiming the economy will crash, simply because that’s what they’re rooting for. They would rather fear-monger and gaslight the masses than report the truth. This is why Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said what needed to be said when CBS News’ Margaret Brennan tried to corner him about illogical predictions that make no sense.


NEW: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent strikes down CBS News’ Margaret Brennan by reminding her about her own previous comments about inflation.

Another rough weekend for Margaret.

Brennan: “The reality is there will either be less inventory or things at higher prices or both.”… pic.twitter.com/eONA9xNqxT
— Collin Rugg
title: CBS News Tries To Corner Trump's Treasury Secretary Over Inflation, Fails In Glorious Fashion

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
It’s June, which means it’s time to be prideful of insignificant preferences. Today’s show breaks down the dumb things companies are doing to cave to the gay agenda.

“It’s the most wondeful time of queer,” Crowder said.

According to NBC:

Overall, 1 in 4 respondents, or 25%, said they supported trans women participating in female sp
title: Watch: Goot Gay Fatigue? Pride Month is Cringe & America is Fed Up!

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
The only problem with the so-called “tolerant” left is that they are the most intolerant among us. This is why it’s not surprising when a Transtifa member randomly decides to assault an innocent man for reasons that will never be moral. However, unfortunately for the “they/them,” you can't randomly attack people with flags in front of the police and expect to get away with it.

"Transtifa" member starts crying while being arrested in California after assaulting a man with a transgender flag.

The incident unfolded at the CIF State Championship, where male AB Hernandez is competing in girls' track.

"I was targeted and violently assaulted today by… pic.twitter.com/kq2FrfMWp3
— Collin Rugg (@CollinRugg)
title: Watch: Woke activist finds out attacking someone with a trans flag is illegal, cries when they/them is arrested

author: Brodigan
description:
An Egyptian national who overstayed his visa during the Biden administration allegedly perpetrated a terror attack against a pro-Israel rally in Colorado. The federal government categorizes Middle Easterners as white. We’re not sure that’s accurate. Gerald is going to explain to us what happened in Poland’s elections over the weekend. Does anyone know what time it is? It’s gay time! Pride Month is here and it’s awful. Let’s see what dumb things companies are doing to cave to the gay agenda.

“WHITE MALE” TERROR ATTACK IN COLORADO
title: Gay Fatigue: Pride Month is Cringe & America is Fed Up (Sources)

author: Brodigan
description:
The phrase "we are so back" has been thrown around a lot since Donald Trump's reelection, and while that is the most prime example, a close second is that they made Happy Gilmore 2. Why? Because Adam Sandler is for everyone. If there is any American living in America who can unite us, it's The Sandman. At least until progressives get triggered over a joke they find to be problematic. Or over the fact that Sandler thinks October 7th was a bad thing.

Ok, no more politics. I've gathered you here today for cheap laughs, so laughing cheapily we shall!

Here we go pic.twitter.com/bo9OA5Yc3F
— Adam Sandler (@AdamSandler) June 1, 2025
title: Adam Sandler drops final "Happy Gilmore 2" trailer, and the plot is everything you'd hope it would be

author: Brodigan
description:
Democrats are still trying to figure out how they lost the male vote by being Democrats, and they might have stumbled on a solution: Harass gym bros while they are banging and clanging. The gym is popular among young men. I guess the plan is to convince them that if they become Democrats, they can also become women and easily rack up weight lifting championships or something.

This is all due to a new piece of journalisming content by NBC News. Yes, the same NBC News that also ran think pieces about how working out was a gateway to right-wing extremism and white supremacy.
title: Democrats' new plan to attract male voters is to harass them at the gym, don't realize the gym is part of Democrats' problem
